full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DE NAS KHRUS BUM SGRUBS PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI PHYAG LEN LTAR BRIS PA'I 'DI LA NONGS PA'I CHA YOD NA BLA MA YI DAM MKHA' 'GRO CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG MA RNAMS KYI SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS SO, ,SGRIB PA MI GYUR BA DANG BYIN GYIS BRLAB TU GSOL, ,'DI LA BRTEN NAS 'GRO BA'I NAD GDON SOGS, ,NYES PA'I TSOGS KUN MA LUS ZHI GYUR CIG , ,,DGE 'DIS BDAG GYIS GZO BYAS SEMS CAN KUN, ,ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU SKYE BAR SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
